fr.sii.ogham.core.template.detector

Class CompositeTemplateDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.template.detector.CompositeTemplateDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TemplateEngineDetector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrTemplateDetector

    public abstract class CompositeTemplateDetector
extends Object
implements TemplateEngineDetector
    A decorator for template engine detection that relies on other template engine detectors. It implements the template design pattern to simplify algorithms with interaction of multiple detectors.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositeTemplateDetector(List<TemplateEngineDetector> detectors)
      Initialize the composite detector with the provided detector implementation list.
      CompositeTemplateDetector(TemplateEngineDetector... detectors)
      Initialize the composite detector with none, one or several detector implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • addDetector

        public void addDetector(TemplateEngineDetector detector)
        Register a new template engine detector. The detector is added at the end and will be used only if none of the previous detectors could handle the template.
        Parameters:
        detector - the template engine detector to register

      • getDetectors

        public List<TemplateEngineDetector> getDetectors()
